scripts.compile-assets: cd ./src/assets && echo Compiling assets... && tsc && echo Assets compiled to /out && cd ..
scripts.compile-server: cd ./src && echo Compiling server... && tsc && echo Server compiled to /out && cd ..
scripts.ca-s: npm run compile-assets && npm run start
scripts.cs-s: npm run compile-server && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm run compile-server && npm run compile-assets && npm run start
